FuncDef: This command allows the user to configure a text message for use along with SNMP trap and log event messages that are sent when the system generates an alarm. The system generates the default message "Alarm Input Triggered" if no message is configured. Thetrigger-alarm-msgstring is included in the log event when the pin changes from the normal state.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a printable character string, up to 160 characters in length.
